channel.title: Alright, I have a few problems
channel.description: Alright, number 1: I don't know how to get on.. "Error Connecting to Server", any suggestions? Number 2: Where do you find item codes, I'd really like to know what codes to use to pick something up.. Number 3: Am I doing something wrong with the server? I'm using ThundaScape, I put in name and pass, found a server, put in my username and pass on Mopar, and then IP. Then comes the "Error Connecting to Server".. Anywho, any suggestions and help would be appreciated, thanks.

item.title: Alright, I have a few problems
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“marcomajor, post:1, topic:28949”]Alright, number 1: I don’t know how to get on… “Error Connecting to Server”, any suggestions?
Number 2: Where do you find item codes, I’d really like to know what codes to use to pick something up…
Number 3: Am I doing something wrong with the server? I’m using ThundaScape, I put in name and pass, found a server, put in my username and pass on Mopar, and then IP. Then comes the “Error Connecting to Server”… Anywho, any suggestions and help would be appreciated, thanks.[/quote]

One:
Servers probally offline.
Two:
Try www.Dodian.com <-- Has an good items list.
Three:
As I said, probally offline, try other servers.

Read full topic
